scripts.start-prod: firebase use default && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV="production" npm run start
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build-prod && firebase use default && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy-prod-hosting: npm run build-prod && firebase use default && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.start-dev: firebase use default && cross-env REACT_APP_ENV="development" npm run start
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build-dev && firebase use default && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy-dev-hosting: npm run build-dev && firebase use default && firebase deploy --only hosting
